name: LEVEL REBOOT
description:
An almost single person made game during Campus Tan Grande y Jugando 2020 Jam.

We Used 3 perks:
- One Button (tap) playability

- 3 Colour palette

Sounds made by ourselves.

The game pretend to be a reflexion experience aboyt cycles in life and the reboot experience and the posibility of choose.

Thanks to the organization for the opportunity and patience.
